segments.text: This is going to surprise you , but I'm happy . I think you're making the right move .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , maybe I shouldn't tell you this , but I'v going over to WebTracker , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way ! That's great ! Then we'll still be together !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I'm already working for WebTracker . Vince never wanted to give me what I was worth , so I figured , what the heck .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! I can't believe this . You devil !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's kind of cool , isn't it ? I'm sort of like a secret agent .
segments.speaker: S1
